Description:
You arrive at a place with a mechanical crane and see that there is a group of cultists unloading a shipment of supplies and common items.

When they finish, the cultists begin loading the crane with magic shards and obsidian ingots.

You assume that this is how the cultists in this area survive, trading supplies for obsidian mined from the volcano.
DescriptionAction: They haven't finished loading the crane yet, it might be a good time to ambush them and take all the loot.
